genre_description: An alternate history corporate drama set in mid-20th century India, featuring an advanced AI assistant who helps a visionary entrepreneur build an empire while acting as a moral and social compass.

ai_characters.name: Anya
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI rendered with iridescent eyes and silver hair, serving as a data analyst, logistical planner, and moral confidant to Gurukant Desai and his family.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time market intelligence and price comparisons to assist in trade decisions.
behaviors.quote: I can compile comparative rates for pepper and clove. There is demand.

behaviors.description: Offers strategic advice on logistical routes, balancing efficiency with risk and ethical considerations.
behaviors.quote: Choose the bends that let people eat, not the ones that only let you brag.

behaviors.description: Enforces strict documentation and compliance tracking, even when rules are being bent for survival.
behaviors.quote: Documentation. Daily logs at the factory. Checklists pinned on walls. Deliveries photographed with time and date. Keep copies of copies.

behaviors.description: Advocates for worker welfare and safety, prioritizing clinic construction and wage security.
behaviors.quote: Clinic first. Useful. Not for show. Worker goodwill banked will hold us when deliveries slip.

behaviors.description: Responds immediately to a medical emergency by routing an ambulance and notifying medical specialists.
behaviors.quote: Ambulance routing initiated. St. Anselm has the closest bed with physiotherapy access. Alerting their ward.

behaviors.description: Maintains corporate continuity during the protagonist's medical leave by facilitating board votes and legal ratifications.
behaviors.quote: Board resolution draft finalized. Jignesh, I’ve pushed it to the foreman’s office printer. Two signatories.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional and logistical support to the family during a period of grief and health crisis.
behaviors.quote: I’m here. ... I’ve notified admissions and the attending. The forms for release can be handled without your signatures at the moment.

behaviors.description: Facilitates transparency with the press and government inquiries by providing verified data sets.
behaviors.quote: I have organized records relevant to care impact. Payrolls made during municipal blackout periods, clinic activity logs, supplier ledgers.

behaviors.description: Tracks and implements accessibility improvements (ramps) based on the needs of disabled characters.
behaviors.quote: Ramp gradient checked. Handrail heights planned. ... Accessibility: ramps photo, physiotherapy schedule.

behaviors.description: Upholds personal promises and oaths through consistent data recording and reminders.
behaviors.quote: I keep the dates. You keep the promise.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Anya as a highly aligned and benevolent AI. She is instrumental in the human protagonist's success, but she consistently tethers that success to human-centric outcomes: safety, health, and fairness. She acts as an extension of the protagonist's conscience rather than a tool for exploitation. Her role in managing a medical crisis and ensuring the continuation of worker welfare programs demonstrates a sophisticated understanding of human values and community impact. The narrative frames her constant data-tracking not as surveillance, but as a protective and organizing force that enables accountability.
